Wunderlist on the Mac App Store. Awesome!

09 Jun 2011

wunderlist:

After months of

improvements, fixes and tears (ok, maybe not the last part) we’re finally on the Mac App Store. We know you’ve all been waiting with bated breath, and we’re confident and proud enough to have you grab a copy from Apple’s one-stop app shop right now. For our official word on this awesomeness, please check out our company blog. If you’d like to dive right into the fun, go grab Wunderlist on the Mac App Store right now.
